item.title: How Many Kids Did You Save Today?
item.description: Rush Limbaugh says radical feminism’s goal is to see that every abortion that can happen does. Today, I witnessed the opposite of that murderous goal. Today, I was lucky enough to rub elbows with beautiful people who make sure every life that can happen does. And every life saved is given the necessities to thrive. At my very first Knights of Columbus meeting in June, a man stood up to speak.
